episodes.title: Episode 1
episodes.description: After his father is killed, young Uhtred is captured by the Danes and raised as one of their own.

episodes.title: Episode 2
episodes.description: Uhtred begins to question his loyalties as the Danes prepare to attack his ancestral home.

episodes.title: Episode 3
episodes.description: Uhtred must prove his worth to the Danes while struggling with his Saxon heritage.

episodes.title: Episode 4
episodes.description: Alfred's kingdom is threatened as Uhtred finds himself torn between two worlds.

episodes.title: Episode 5
episodes.description: Uhtred's loyalties are tested as the conflict between Saxons and Danes escalates.

episodes.title: Episode 6
episodes.description: A major battle looms as Uhtred must make a decisive choice about his future.

episodes.title: Episode 7
episodes.description: Uhtred takes on a dangerous mission that could change the course of the war.

episodes.title: Episode 8
episodes.description: The conflict reaches a boiling point as Uhtred's past comes back to haunt him.

episodes.title: Episode 9
episodes.description: Uhtred faces his greatest challenge yet as the fate of the kingdom hangs in balance.

episodes.title: Episode 10
episodes.description: The season concludes with dramatic revelations and a cliffhanger for Uhtred's future.

episodes.description: Uhtred faces a moral dilemma that could cost him everything he's fought for.

episodes.title: Episode 10
episodes.description: The season finale leaves Uhtred's future uncertain as new threats emerge.

episodes.title: Chapter One: The Vanishing of Will Byers
episodes.description: A young boy vanishes into thin air, and as friends, family and local police search for answers.

episodes.title: Chapter Two: The Weirdo on Maple Street
episodes.description: Lucas, Mike and Dustin try to talk to the girl they found in the woods.

episodes.title: Chapter Three: Holly, Jolly
episodes.description: An increasingly concerned Nancy looks for Barb and finds out what Jonathan's been up to.

episodes.title: Chapter Four: The Body
episodes.description: Refusing to believe Will is dead, Joyce tries to connect with her son.

episodes.title: Chapter Five: The Flea and the Acrobat
episodes.description: Hopper breaks into the lab while Nancy and Jonathan confront the force that took Will.

episodes.title: Chapter Six: The Monster
episodes.description: Eleven's past is revealed as she recalls how she came to Hawkins.

episodes.title: Chapter Seven: The Bathtub
episodes.description: Eleven tries to reach Will while Lucas warns that 'the bad men are coming'.

episodes.title: Chapter Eight: The Upside Down
episodes.description: Dr. Brenner holds Hopper and Joyce for questioning while the kids wait with Eleven in the gym.

episodes.title: Chapter Nine: The Gate
episodes.description: The boys and Eleven stage an elaborate rescue attempt as the lab closes in on them.

episodes.title: Chapter Ten: The Aftermath
episodes.description: The aftermath of the battle leaves Hawkins changed forever.

episodes.title: Chapter One: MADMAX
episodes.description: One year after Will's return, the town prepares for Halloween and new threats emerge.

episodes.title: Chapter Two: Trick or Treat, Freak
episodes.description: Will's visions intensify as Dustin adopts an unusual new pet.

episodes.title: Chapter Three: The Pollywog
episodes.description: Dustin tries to bond with his new friend while Nancy and Jonathan dig deeper.

episodes.title: Chapter Four: Will the Wise
episodes.description: Will connects with a mysterious presence as Eleven searches for her past.

episodes.title: Chapter Five: Dig Dug
episodes.description: Hopper gets trapped while the kids stumble upon a secret underground tunnel.

episodes.title: Chapter Six: The Spy
episodes.description: Will's connection to a dark evil grows stronger, endangering those around him.

episodes.title: Chapter Seven: The Lost Sister
episodes.description: Eleven journeys to find her 'sister' and learns more about her origins.

episodes.title: Chapter Eight: The Mind Flayer
episodes.description: The group realizes Will is in grave danger as the true enemy reveals itself.

episodes.title: Chapter Nine: The Gate
episodes.description: The group bands together to close the gate to the Upside Down for good.

episodes.title: Chapter Ten: The Snow Ball
episodes.description: The town celebrates at the Snow Ball as relationships evolve.

episodes.title: Chapter One: Suzie, Do You Copy?
episodes.description: Summer brings new jobs and budding romance, but evil never takes a vacation.

episodes.title: Chapter Two: The Mall Rats
episodes.description: The group splits up to investigate strange occurrences around Hawkins.

episodes.title: Chapter Three: The Case of the Missing Lifeguard
episodes.description: El and Max go shopping as Steve and Dustin follow a lead to the mall.

episodes.title: Chapter Four: The Sauna Test
episodes.description: A risky plan is hatched to confront the evil that's taken hold of Hawkins.

episodes.title: Chapter Five: The Flayed
episodes.description: Nancy and Jonathan follow a lead that takes them to a horrifying discovery.

episodes.title: Chapter Six: E Pluribus Unum
episodes.description: The Mind Flayer grows stronger as the group scrambles to stop it.

episodes.title: Chapter Seven: The Bite
episodes.description: A major battle leaves one of the group seriously injured.

episodes.title: Chapter Eight: The Battle of Starcourt
episodes.description: The group faces off against the Mind Flayer in an epic showdown at the mall.

episodes.title: Chapter Nine: The Aftermath
episodes.description: The town mourns its losses as the group prepares for new challenges.

episodes.title: Chapter Ten: Moving On
episodes.description: The Byers family prepares to leave Hawkins as relationships evolve.

episodes.title: Chapter One: The Hellfire Club
episodes.description: Six months later, the group faces new threats from Hawkins and beyond.

episodes.title: Chapter Two: Vecna's Curse
episodes.description: A new supernatural terror emerges as the group investigates recent deaths.

episodes.title: Chapter Three: The Monster and the Superhero
episodes.description: El struggles with her powers while the group uncovers more about Vecna.

episodes.title: Chapter Four: Dear Billy
episodes.description: Max faces her darkest fears as Vecna's curse takes hold.

episodes.title: Chapter Five: The Nina Project
episodes.description: El undergoes a dangerous experiment to regain her powers.

episodes.title: Chapter Six: The Dive
episodes.description: The group splits up to gather information and weapons against Vecna.

episodes.title: Chapter Seven: The Massacre at Hawkins Lab
episodes.description: The truth about Vecna's origins is revealed in a shocking flashback.

episodes.title: Chapter Eight: Papa
episodes.description: El confronts her past as the group prepares for the final battle.

episodes.title: Chapter Nine: The Piggyback
episodes.description: The group launches an all-out attack on Vecna in the Upside Down.

episodes.title: Chapter Ten: The Aftermath
episodes.description: Hawkins is forever changed as the group deals with the consequences.

episodes.title: Chapter 1: The Mandalorian
episodes.description: A Mandalorian bounty hunter takes a mysterious job that puts him on an unexpected path.

episodes.title: Chapter 2: The Child
episodes.description: The Mandalorian protects his unusual bounty from dangerous adversaries.

episodes.title: Chapter 3: The Sin
episodes.description: The Mandalorian returns to collect his reward but faces unexpected consequences.

episodes.title: Chapter 4: Sanctuary
episodes.description: The Mandalorian and the Child take refuge with unexpected allies.

episodes.title: Chapter 5: The Gunslinger
episodes.description: The Mandalorian helps a rookie bounty hunter on a desert planet.

episodes.title: Chapter 6: The Prisoner
episodes.description: The Mandalorian joins a crew on a dangerous prison break mission.

episodes.title: Chapter 7: The Reckoning
episodes.description: The Mandalorian returns to his client with an unexpected proposition.

episodes.title: Chapter 8: Redemption
episodes.description: The Mandalorian makes a fateful choice that will change his path forever.

episodes.title: Chapter 9: The Rescue
episodes.description: The Mandalorian launches a daring operation to save his young charge.

episodes.title: Chapter 10: The Choice
episodes.description: The season concludes with the Mandalorian facing the consequences of his actions.

episodes.title: Chapter 11: The Marshal
episodes.description: The Mandalorian searches for other Mandalorians who might help his quest.

episodes.title: Chapter 12: The Passenger
episodes.description: Transporting an unexpected passenger leads to dangerous complications.

episodes.title: Chapter 13: The Jedi
episodes.description: The Mandalorian encounters a mysterious warrior with surprising abilities.

episodes.title: Chapter 14: The Tragedy
episodes.description: The Child's safety is threatened as enemies close in from all sides.

episodes.title: Chapter 15: The Believer
episodes.description: An unlikely ally helps the Mandalorian track down Moff Gideon.

episodes.title: Chapter 16: The Rescue
episodes.description: The Mandalorian launches a daring mission to save his young companion.

episodes.title: Chapter 17: The Reunion
episodes.description: Old allies return to help in the final confrontation with Moff Gideon.

episodes.title: Chapter 18: The Duel
episodes.description: The Mandalorian faces off against Moff Gideon in an epic lightsaber battle.

episodes.title: Chapter 19: The Farewell
episodes.description: The Child's destiny is revealed as the Mandalorian makes a difficult choice.

episodes.title: Chapter 20: The Mandalorian
episodes.description: The season concludes with a new chapter beginning for our hero.

episodes.title: Chapter 21: The Return
episodes.description: The Mandalorian begins a new journey to reclaim his place in Mandalorian society.

episodes.title: Chapter 22: The Mines
episodes.description: The Mandalorian helps a group of miners facing a mysterious threat.

episodes.title: Chapter 23: The Foundling
episodes.description: The Mandalorian takes a young foundling under his wing.

episodes.title: Chapter 24: The Spies
episodes.description: Imperial remnants plot against the New Republic and the Mandalorians.

episodes.title: Chapter 25: The Pirate
episodes.description: The Mandalorian helps defend a peaceful planet from pirate attacks.

episodes.title: Chapter 26: The Scientist
episodes.description: An Imperial scientist holds dangerous knowledge about the Child's origins.

episodes.title: Chapter 27: The Shadow
episodes.description: Dark forces move against the Mandalorian as he prepares for his final mission.

episodes.title: Chapter 28: The Siege
episodes.description: The Mandalorian leads an assault on an Imperial stronghold.

episodes.title: Chapter 29: The Reckoning
episodes.description: The penultimate episode sets the stage for the season's dramatic conclusion.

episodes.title: Chapter 30: The Mandalorian Way
episodes.description: The season concludes with the Mandalorian embracing his destiny.

episodes.title: Pilot
episodes.description: Diagnosed with terminal lung cancer, a high school chemistry teacher resorts to cooking meth.

episodes.title: Cat's in the Bag...
episodes.description: Walt and Jesse try to dispose of two bodies while Skyler grows suspicious of Walt's behavior.

episodes.title: ...And the Bag's in the River
episodes.description: Walt makes a difficult decision about Krazy-8 while Jesse tries to sell their product.

episodes.title: Cancer Man
episodes.description: Walt and Jesse attempt to expand their operation while Walt considers treatment options.

episodes.title: Gray Matter
episodes.description: Walt rejects help from former colleagues while Jesse tries to sell meth at a Narcotics Anonymous meeting.

episodes.title: Crazy Handful of Nothin'
episodes.description: Walt's cancer treatment begins as he adopts a new persona to intimidate a drug dealer.

episodes.title: A No-Rough-Stuff-Type Deal
episodes.description: Walt and Jesse negotiate with Tuco while Hank investigates the blue meth.

episodes.title: Seven Thirty-Seven
episodes.description: Walt and Jesse realize Tuco is dangerous and plan to get out of their deal.

episodes.title: Grilled
episodes.description: Walt and Jesse are taken to Tuco's hideout where they must find a way to escape.

episodes.title: Phoenix
episodes.description: Walt and Jesse's partnership is tested as personal relationships become complicated.

episodes.title: Seven Thirty-Seven
episodes.description: Walt and Jesse deal with the aftermath of Tuco's death and plan their next move.

episodes.title: Grilled
episodes.description: Walt and Jesse struggle to find a new distributor for their product.

episodes.title: Bit by a Dead Bee
episodes.description: Walt devises an alibi for his disappearance while Jesse tries to sell their meth.

episodes.title: Down
episodes.description: Financial pressures mount for Walt while Jesse deals with personal losses.

episodes.title: Breakage
episodes.description: Hank returns to work while Walt and Jesse expand their operation.

episodes.title: Peekaboo
episodes.description: Jesse attempts to collect money from addicts while Skyler investigates Walt's lies.

episodes.title: Negro y Azul
episodes.description: The blue meth gains notoriety while Walt and Jesse clash over business practices.

episodes.title: Better Call Saul
episodes.description: Walt and Jesse enlist the help of a colorful lawyer when Badger is arrested.

episodes.title: 4 Days Out
episodes.description: Walt and Jesse embark on a marathon cook in the desert with unexpected results.

episodes.title: Over
episodes.description: Walt celebrates good news while Jesse spirals into depression.

episodes.title: No Más
episodes.description: Walt tries to move on from his criminal life while a new player enters the drug trade.

episodes.title: Caballo sin Nombre
episodes.description: Walt's home life deteriorates while Jesse bonds with his rehab friends.

episodes.title: I.F.T.
episodes.description: Skyler takes drastic action against Walt while Jesse's new friends cause trouble.

episodes.title: Green Light
episodes.description: Hank pursues the blue meth case while Walt gets drawn back into the business.

episodes.title: Más
episodes.description: Walt and Jesse begin cooking for Gus while Skyler makes a business proposal.

episodes.title: Sunset
episodes.description: Hank closes in on Jesse while Walt and Jesse face a crisis in the lab.

episodes.title: One Minute
episodes.description: Hank's life is in danger while Jesse's behavior causes problems for Walt.

episodes.title: I See You
episodes.description: Hank recovers from his injuries while Walt and Jesse deal with the aftermath.

episodes.title: Kafkaesque
episodes.description: Walt and Jesse adjust to working for Gus while Skyler launders their money.

episodes.title: Fly
episodes.description: Walt becomes obsessed with a contaminant in the lab while Jesse grows frustrated.

episodes.title: Box Cutter
episodes.description: Gus deals with the aftermath of Gale's death while Walt and Jesse face consequences.

episodes.title: Thirty-Eight Snub
episodes.description: Walt buys a gun for protection while Jesse struggles with guilt over Gale's death.

episodes.title: Open House
episodes.description: Marie pressures Hank to return to work while Jesse looks for a way to cope.

episodes.title: Bullet Points
episodes.description: Walt and Skyler prepare their cover story while Jesse bonds with Mike.

episodes.title: Shotgun
episodes.description: Jesse accompanies Mike on collections while Walt grows suspicious of their relationship.

episodes.title: Cornered
episodes.description: Walt asserts his dominance after a confrontation while Skyler makes a bold move.

episodes.title: Problem Dog
episodes.description: Jesse attends group therapy while Walt devises a plan to take down Gus.

episodes.title: Hermanos
episodes.description: The history between Gus and Hector Salamanca is revealed.

episodes.title: Bug
episodes.description: Walt and Jesse's partnership reaches a breaking point as tensions rise.

episodes.title: Salud
episodes.description: Gus travels to Mexico while Walt puts his plan into motion back home.

episodes.title: Live Free or Die
episodes.description: Walt, Jesse and Mike deal with the aftermath of Gus's death and cover their tracks.

episodes.title: Madrigal
episodes.description: The DEA investigates Gus's empire while Walt, Jesse and Mike plan their next move.

episodes.title: Hazard Pay
episodes.description: The team finds a new place to cook while Skyler becomes increasingly fearful of Walt.

episodes.title: Fifty-One
episodes.description: Walt celebrates his 51st birthday while Skyler's anxiety reaches a breaking point.

episodes.title: Dead Freight
episodes.description: The team executes a daring train heist to secure methylamine.

episodes.title: Buyout
episodes.description: Jesse wants out of the business after a tragic accident during the train heist.

episodes.title: Say My Name
episodes.description: Walt asserts his dominance in the drug trade while Jesse tries to leave.

episodes.title: Gliding Over All
episodes.description: Walt's empire reaches its peak as his personal life continues to crumble.

episodes.title: Blood Money
episodes.description: Hank discovers Walt's secret and confronts him in a dramatic showdown.

episodes.title: Ozymandias
episodes.description: The series reaches its climax as Walt's empire collapses around him.

episodes.title: Wolferton Splash
episodes.description: As King George VI's health worsens, Princess Elizabeth and Prince Philip prepare for a royal tour.

episodes.title: Hyde Park Corner
episodes.description: Elizabeth learns of her father's death while in Kenya and returns home as Queen.

episodes.title: Windsor
episodes.description: The Queen must decide whether the royal family will keep the Windsor name.

episodes.title: Act of God
episodes.description: A deadly smog envelops London, testing the new Queen's leadership.

episodes.title: Smoke and Mirrors
episodes.description: The preparations for Elizabeth's coronation expose tensions within the royal family.

episodes.title: Gelignite
episodes.description: Princess Margaret's romance with Peter Townsend creates a constitutional crisis.

episodes.title: Scientia Potentia Est
episodes.description: The Queen must choose between her sister's happiness and royal protocol.

episodes.title: Pride & Joy
episodes.description: Prince Charles starts boarding school as the Queen and Duke face marital tensions.

episodes.title: Assassins
episodes.description: Churchill faces pressure to retire as the Queen considers her role in modern Britain.

episodes.title: Gloriana
episodes.description: The Queen reflects on her first years of reign as she faces personal and political challenges.

episodes.title: Misadventure
episodes.description: The Suez Crisis strains relations between Britain and Egypt, and within the royal marriage.

episodes.title: A Company of Men
episodes.description: Philip's friendship with a TV personality raises eyebrows as Elizabeth deals with politics.

episodes.title: Lisbon
episodes.description: Margaret's romance with a glamorous photographer causes controversy.

episodes.title: Beryl
episodes.description: The Queen must intervene when a scandal threatens the monarchy's reputation.

episodes.title: Marionettes
episodes.description: A royal tour of Ghana becomes a pivotal moment in the Queen's reign.

episodes.title: Vergangenheit
episodes.description: A shocking revelation about the Duke of Windsor's wartime activities surfaces.

episodes.title: Matrimonium
episodes.description: Margaret's relationship with Tony Armstrong-Jones develops as Philip's past resurfaces.

episodes.title: Dear Mrs. Kennedy
episodes.description: The Queen meets Jackie Kennedy during a tense period in Anglo-American relations.

episodes.title: Paterfamilias
episodes.description: Philip's harsh parenting methods at Gordonstoun are revealed through flashbacks.

episodes.title: Mystery Man
episodes.description: The season concludes with the Queen facing personal and political challenges.

episodes.title: Olding
episodes.description: A new era begins as an older Queen faces challenges from Prime Minister Harold Wilson.

episodes.title: Margaretology
episodes.description: Margaret's charm offensive in America proves unexpectedly successful.

episodes.title: Aberfan
episodes.description: A tragic mining disaster in Wales tests the Queen's ability to show emotion.

episodes.title: Bubbikins
episodes.description: Philip's mother comes to stay, revealing surprising aspects of her personality.

episodes.title: Coup
episodes.description: The Queen must intervene when Wilson suspects a plot against his government.

episodes.title: Tywysog Cymru
episodes.description: Charles begins his investiture as Prince of Wales amidst political tensions.

episodes.title: Moondust
episodes.description: The moon landing prompts Philip to question his life's purpose.

episodes.title: Dangling Man
episodes.description: The Queen considers her legacy as the 1960s come to a close.

episodes.title: Imbroglio
episodes.description: Charles' romance with Camilla Shand begins as the royal family faces scrutiny.

episodes.title: Cri de Coeur
episodes.description: Margaret's marriage reaches a breaking point as the season concludes.

episodes.title: Gold Stick
episodes.description: Margaret Thatcher becomes Prime Minister as Charles meets Diana Spencer.

episodes.title: The Balmoral Test
episodes.description: Thatcher's visit to Balmoral reveals cultural clashes with the royal family.

episodes.title: Fairytale
episodes.description: Charles and Diana's wedding captivates the world but masks growing troubles.

episodes.title: Favourites
episodes.description: The Queen's relationships with her children are tested as Diana struggles.

episodes.title: Fagan
episodes.description: A break-in at Buckingham Palace exposes security flaws and royal vulnerabilities.

episodes.title: Terra Nullius
episodes.description: Charles and Diana tour Australia as their marriage continues to deteriorate.

episodes.title: The Hereditary Principle
episodes.description: The Queen must deal with a family health crisis and political tensions.
Thatcher's policies create conflict with the Queen over Commonwealth matters.

episodes.title: Avalanche
episodes.description: Charles and Diana's marital problems become public as the media circus grows.

episodes.title: War
episodes.description: The season concludes with the Falklands War and the royal family's future uncertain.

episodes.title: Queen Victoria Syndrome
episodes.description: The monarchy faces criticism as Charles and Diana's separation becomes official.

episodes.title: The System
episodes.description: Diana's explosive interview threatens to destabilize the royal family.

episodes.title: Mou Mou
episodes.description: The backstory of Mohamed Al-Fayed is revealed through flashbacks.

episodes.title: Annus Horribilis
episodes.description: A series of scandals and a devastating fire make 1992 the Queen's worst year.

episodes.title: The Way Ahead
episodes.description: The Queen considers modernizing the monarchy as public opinion shifts.

episodes.title: Ipatiev House
episodes.description: Philip becomes obsessed with the Romanovs as parallels to the monarchy emerge.

episodes.title: No Woman's Land
episodes.description: The Queen reflects on changing gender roles as Diana makes headlines.

episodes.title: Gunpowder
episodes.description: Charles and Diana's divorce negotiations reach a critical point.

episodes.title: Couple 31
episodes.description: Diana's relationship with Dodi Al-Fayed develops as the paparazzi pursue them.

episodes.title: Decommissioned
episodes.description: The season concludes with the aftermath of Diana's tragic death.

episodes.title: Persona Non Grata
episodes.description: The royal family deals with the aftermath of Diana's death and public outrage.

episodes.title: Two Photographs
episodes.description: The Queen must balance private grief with public expectations.

episodes.title: Dis-Moi Oui
episodes.description: Charles pursues Camilla as William begins university.

episodes.title: Aftermath
episodes.description: The monarchy works to rebuild its reputation in the wake of the Diana crisis.

episodes.title: Willsmania
episodes.description: William's popularity grows as he navigates university life and royal duties.

episodes.title: Ruritania
episodes.description: Charles and Camilla's relationship faces public scrutiny and family resistance.

episodes.title: Alma Mater
episodes.description: The Queen reflects on her reign as she visits places significant to her early life.

episodes.title: Ritz
episodes.description: The Queen Mother's life is celebrated as she reaches her 100th birthday.

episodes.title: Hope Street
episodes.description: Charles and Camilla finally marry, marking a new chapter for the monarchy.

episodes.title: Sleep, Dearie Sleep
episodes.description: The series concludes with the Queen reflecting on her reign and legacy.
